__e: The technicians have found things in Benjamin's letter.
Our techs had never seen anything like it.
The tech guys have the computer we found in his apartment.
As much as I could use the hand, a defense attorney would have a field day with a forensic tech who not only found a murder but knew the victim and then worked it.
It's usually caused by poorly set-up equipment, so when I heard it for the first time a few weeks ago I just made a note to myself to talk to the station technicians, but then I realized something.
You know, it's like there's this technician in here... somewhere that should've been fired like a long time ago.
